definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: The sunshine bodes well for our barbecue.
sentences.chinese: 明媚的陽光對我們的烤肉野餐是個吉兆。

sentences.english: Youth is sadness, bright and beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 小四說，青春是道明媚的憂傷。

sentences.english: It is famous for its sunny, pleasant summer and long golden beaches.
sentences.chinese: 它以陽光明媚的怡人夏日和長長的金海岸而聞名。

sentences.english: When the sky is fair, we are pleasured in heart.
sentences.chinese: 當外面的世界明媚的時候，我們的內心是愉悅的。

sentences.english: Although the sun was shining the other day, my father took the umbrella with him to be on the safe side.
sentences.chinese: 雖然那天陽光明媚，我父親還是帶上了雨傘以防不測。

sentences.english: This was the happy side of the house .
sentences.chinese: 這是住宅風光明媚的一面。

sentences.english: The weather this morning is sunny with bright sunshine and a cloudless blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，天氣晴朗，陽光明媚，碧空萬里烏雲。

sentences.english: In the fleeting sadness, opened in the summer sun is the most beautiful day.
sentences.chinese: 流年裏的憂傷，開在了夏季陽光最明媚那一天。

sentences.english: Today is not one of those days. Outside, the sun is shining, birds are chirping and the dogwood tree is getting ready to bloom.
sentences.chinese: 外面，陽光明媚，鳥兒啁啾，山茱萸樹正待開花。

sentences.english: They often go for a picnic in sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 他們總在陽光明媚的日子去野餐。

sentences.english: The clouds and the boat are set on a golden velum by the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 雲和船都被明媚的陽光鑲上了一層金色的膜。

sentences.english: The flowers bud will weather the attacks from cold wind and rain, making it way blossom into the fair spring.
sentences.chinese: 讓含苞的花蕾經受住寒風冷雨，綻放在明媚的春天。

sentences.english: And there were gardens bright with sinuous rills.
sentences.chinese: 明媚的花園，曲折的小溪。

sentences.english: The total affordable heavy makeup, dress, high heels, elegant, beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 濃妝淡抹總相宜，連衣裙，高跟鞋，優雅，明媚。

sentences.english: The windows reflected the bright afternoon sun-light .
sentences.chinese: 窗戶反射着午後明媚的陽光。

sentences.english: Miller's big house in the sunny Santa Clara valley.
sentences.chinese: 米勒先生的房子很大，地處陽光明媚的聖克拉拉山谷。

definition: bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
